questions.question: Choose the relevant options that are examples of eavesdropping:

answers.b: Deleting the data in the system

questions.question: How the attacker gathers information from the system in eavesdropping?

answers.a: By capturing the related network traffic for later analysis.
answers.c: By altering the transmitted data packets
answers.d: By flooding the network with fake data

questions.question: Which of the following is a type of eavesdropping attack that involves capturing data from wireless networks?
